fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: We are currently following REDII developments closely, as it is of paramount importance for the aviation biofuel industry development.
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit:
The “European Advanced Biofuels FlightPath” initiative was set up as a roadmap to achieve an annual production of two million tons of sustainably produced biofuel for aviation by 2020. 
 
The initiative committed members to support and promote the production, storage and distribution of sustainably produced drop-in biofuels for their use in aviation and establish the appropriate financial mechanisms to support the construction of advanced biofuel production plants in Europe. The initiative aimed at getting biofuels to the market faster and at setting a target level to the amount of sustainable biofuels used in European civil aviation.
industry_forums: We monitor all actions taking place that affect aviation biofuels.
relevant_communication: We are about to publish a position paper regarding the latest develoments of the REDII.
